import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ItemsService } from 'src/app/services/items.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.scss'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private cartItems:ItemsService) { } cartItemsArr:any[]= []; ngOnInit(): void { this.cartItemsArr = this.cartItems.getCartItems() this.cartItemsArr = JSON.parse(this.cartItemsArr) } }
